feels.name: Awe
feels.quote: But still another inquiry remains; one often agitated by the more recondite Nantucketers.
feels.exactPlace: In the presence of the Leviathan skeletons

feels.name: Admiration
feels.quote: But as perhaps fifty of these whale-bone whales are harpooned for one cachalot, some philosophers of the forecastle have concluded that this positive havoc has already very seriously diminished their battalions.

feels.name: Contemplation
feels.quote: But you must look at this matter in every light.

Places.name: Leviathan_skeletons_exhibition
Places.description: The place where the Leviathan skeletons are displayed.

Places.name: The_forecastle
Places.description: The front part of a ship below the deck, traditionally used as the crew's living quarters.
